name: CowCube
description:
This game is about a guy who is in a lonely radioactive world with his trusty weapons, he finds out a lot of enemies on his way through this wasteland. While he was fighting with cow cubes he got infected by them, in the legs so his feet are turning into cubes so he's sliding, the infection cannot be stopped so he must live with the sliding foot. All remaining survivors which are not infected are staying in the sea in steamboats because the cubes cannot swim, but they are lacking food so you need to hurry up saving them and killing cow cubes!
This game doesn't have much content now! But It's going to have a lot of things in the future we are planning to add a lot of things! We would love it if you would try our game!
The game currently has one weapon, cow cubes, and one character
Our devlog! (updates)
Our game has everything made by us, sounds, models
Thanks for trying!
